column5: I got out this morning with a bud (Newfieman) and we had a bit of luck at the warm water outlet. This would be my Personal Best Brownie to date, I put him at about 9 or 10 lbs. Got him on a grey and white Tail Dancer bouncing off the bottom with a real quick retrieve. Boy they hit hard and fight like hell, lot's of aerobatics too. We had 3 or 4 good solid hits each but this was the only one to end up in the boat. Of course he went right back in to be caught again!  Gotta love it!! Hope to get out and nail a few more in the next couple of weeks.  Stan  I also got a small movie on the camera of me catching it but I still don't know how to post it here. The file is about 7 and a half megs.  http://s5.photobucket.com/albums/y175/stan...outMar09001.flv
NICE ONE!!! WAS HOPIN TO GET OUT THERE MYSELF TOO BUT AS USUAL FAMILY COMES FIRST  LOL
Nice male! It must be nice to be on the soft water... I can't wait!
beaty brown, great catch.  im not jelous or anything
Nice fish.. Lake Ontario open water Brown Trout are great fish to catch.. yes, they are big, and fight like hell. Lots of jumps and strong like a Bull.
Sweet looking brown!  Upload that video to photobucket then create a link.  Would love to see the video!
nice looking brown and beauty day to get out in the boat
Nice brown. Great job.  I have noticed a tonne of boats heading out to the big Lake over the last couple of days.  Dirk...
A very nice Brown Trout!!!... and a great report too!!!      Pickering discharge sounds like sounds like a painful symptom to an STD!

Thanks for all the comments. I have now posted the little movie of the catch. It's not very long, the guy on the camera had to turn it off to net the fish. LOL  GCD - Glad we don't have those discharges in Ajax where I live!! lol

Did you guys launch off the beach or at the marina.I'll have to put a bug in my buddy's ear.He says if he doesn't use the boat this year he's gonna sell it.I got great memories of my first brownie plus kings,big carp and sheepshead from there. Kerry
That is a football!  Fine feesh.
That was one great morning out on the lake.  lots of laughs and catching fish is what it is all about. next saturday we will go for a new personal best.   james
niiiiiice fish... I wish they looked that nice on Halloween
Congrats on the nice trout, that can be a good area there
that is a real beauty, thanks
